stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
Retina displays are great for viewing photos reading text and pretty much anything else that is viewed on a screen. But what does your website look like on a retina device? If you're not sure then chances are it doesn't look as good as it should.

Retina devices can display up to four times as many pixels on screen but only if those pixels exist in the first place. Without a Retina-ready website you're left with a standard resolution site that looks just as pixelated on the new iPad as it does on an old computer screen.

With this package you'll receive a full evaluation of your website on a Retina Macbook Pro. Just provide your logo website background navigation and button images in high-resolution (or layered PSD) and we'll make sure that visitors with Retina devices will see the difference.

What can I expect?

  • Add Retina versions of images
  • jQuery plugin to swap images
  • Testing
title: Make your Website Retina Compatible
